Articles.Content:
I'm a semi-realistic 3D artist who have been thinking of joining the forums for a long time; been posting stuff on the facebook page for a while though

My game time is currently 750 hours, but I've yet to visit most of Jool's moons.
I'll post stuff into the fanart section in a near future.

I'm not a fan of long winded introductions, so Hai!

Hell Bluustreak and welcome to the forum!

Glad to have you aboard.  I look forward to seeing your posts.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! I'm in the FB page as well but I don't check it often. Can't wait to see some of your work.
Thanks! I'll be making that fanart post now
